rules_text:
Thing in the Birches can't block.
When Thing in the Birches dies, you may exile it. If you do, exile any number of target permanents you control, then return them to the battlefield under their owners' control.
flavor_text:
[i]“What [/i]was [i]this thing? How did it [/i]do[i] that?”
—Fieldbook of Manuela Martinez[/i]
